data.text:
Uma Musume presents a new TCG, Uma Duel Racers! 
In this brand new game, you can collect cards of Uma 
Musume around the world and become a champion yourself!
data.name: Narrator
data.processed:
<story>Uma Musume presents a new TCG, Uma Duel Racers! 
<story>In this brand new game, you can collect cards of Uma 
<story>Musume around the world and become a champion yourself!

data.text:
They're hosting a card game here for 
the game too! Hehe, doesn't it sound fun?
data.name: Satono Crown
data.processed:
<story>They're hosting a card game here for 
<story>the game too! Hehe, doesn't it sound fun?

data.text:
It really does! I just bought myself a new deck, 
so it'll be a great chance for me to play.
data.name: Satono Diamond
data.processed:
<story>It really does! I just bought myself a new deck, 
<story>so it'll be a great chance for me to play.

data.text:
It's so like you to have us come to a 
tournament so soon after starting the game.
data.name: Satono Crown
data.processed:
<story>It's so like you to have us come to a 
<story>tournament so soon after starting the game.

data.text:
Satono! We're going to be rival duelers today! 
If we face each other, we've gotta go all out!
data.name: Twin Turbo
data.processed:
<story>Satono! We're going to be rival duelers today! 
<story>If we face each other, we've gotta go all out!

data.text:
The Uma Duel Racers morning tournament 
will now begin. Our contestants will be—
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>The Uma Duel Racers morning tournament 
<story>will now begin. Our contestants will be—

data.text:
Nature! The winner gets a year's supply of 
carrot chips. If I win I'll share some with you!
data.name: Twin Turbo
data.processed:
<story>Nature! The winner gets a year's supply of 
<story>carrot chips. If I win I'll share some with you!

data.text: Yeah yeah, I believe in you.
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed: <story>Yeah yeah, I believe in you.

data.text: I looost!!
data.name: Twin Turbo
data.processed: <story>I looost!!

data.text:
Card games sure are difficult… I wish I 
could've won more with the McQueen deck.
data.name: Satono Diamond
data.processed:
<story>Card games sure are difficult… I wish I 
<story>could've won more with the McQueen deck.

data.text:
Hey, Dia… they're still allowing people to register for 
the afternoon tournament. Mind if I borrow your deck?
data.name: Satono Crown
data.processed:
<story>Hey, Dia… they're still allowing people to register for 
<story>the afternoon tournament. Mind if I borrow your deck?

data.text: That's fine, but… are you really going register?!
data.name: Satono Diamond
data.processed: <story>That's fine, but… are you really going register?!

data.text:
You're gonna enter?! Wait, but didn't 
you just recently find out about this game?
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>You're gonna enter?! Wait, but didn't 
<story>you just recently find out about this game?

data.text:
I pretty much figured it all out from Dia and Turbo's duel, 
so don't worry about that. I'm going to avenge you two!
data.name: Satono Crown
data.processed:
<story>I pretty much figured it all out from Dia and Turbo's duel, 
<story>so don't worry about that. I'm going to avenge you two!

data.text:
Dia, I'll show you how powerful 
your deck really is. I'm confident♪
data.name: Satono Crown
data.processed:
<story>Dia, I'll show you how powerful 
<story>your deck really is. I'm confident♪

data.text:
I summon Uma Musume: Mejiro McQueen! I then 
activate my tactical card, Noble Obligation! And that's Goal!
data.name: Satono Crown
data.processed:
<story>I summon Uma Musume: Mejiro McQueen! I then 
<story>activate my tactical card, Noble Obligation! And that's Goal!

data.text:
It's finished! The duel is over! 
The winner is Satono Crown! 
She finished with over 1 billion Race Points!! 
She's the undisputed champion!
data.name: Event Commentator
data.processed:
<story>It's finished! The duel is over! 
<story>The winner is Satono Crown! 
<story>She finished with over 1 billion Race Points!! 
<story>She's the undisputed champion!

data.text: Crown is so amazing!!
data.name: Twin Turbo
data.processed: <story>Crown is so amazing!!

data.text:
She actually managed to win? I guess rich 
smart girls shouldn't be underestimated, huh?
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>She actually managed to win? I guess rich 
<story>smart girls shouldn't be underestimated, huh?

data.text:
Yup♪ Crown's always been like this. 
She grows stronger in the face of adversity.
data.name: Satono Diamond
data.processed:
<story>Yup♪ Crown's always been like this. 
<story>She grows stronger in the face of adversity.

data.text:
That duel was incredible! 
How do I become as good a duel racer as you?!
data.name: Fanboy
data.processed:
<story>That duel was incredible! 
<story>How do I become as good a duel racer as you?!

data.text:
It's better to learn by doing rather 
than having it told to you. Wanna duel me?
data.name: Satono Crown
data.processed:
<story>It's better to learn by doing rather 
<story>than having it told to you. Wanna duel me?

data.text:
Ooh, a champion faces against a 
future competitor… what a great story.
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>Ooh, a champion faces against a 
<story>future competitor… what a great story.

data.text: I lost…
data.name: Satono Crown
data.processed: <story>I lost…

data.text:
Really?! After all that?! Are you cursed to never 
win matches you absolutely should be winning?
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>Really?! After all that?! Are you cursed to never 
<story>win matches you absolutely should be winning?

data.text:
H-Hey! Cheer up! At least you've 
got a bunch of carrot chips now!
data.name: Twin Turbo
data.processed:
<story>H-Hey! Cheer up! At least you've 
<story>got a bunch of carrot chips now!

data.text:
Wh-what I do is none of your business, 
so don't worry about it, okay?
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>Wh-what I do is none of your business, 
<story>so don't worry about it, okay?

data.text:
I said it's fine. Just… 
leave me alone. We'll talk later.
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
<story>I said it's fine. Just… 
<story>leave me alone. We'll talk later.

data.text: Haa… I guess I'll go do some fishing.
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>Haa… I guess I'll go do some fishing.

data.text: I may have said that to Sis, but maybe \Nshe has a point. I haven't done what I can…
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: I may have said that to Sis, but maybe \Nshe has a point. I haven't done what I can…

data.text: Maybe I should be doing more joint training sessions or something. Well, even if I wanted to, I have no friends to do it with…
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: Maybe I should be doing more joint training sessions or something. Well, even if I wanted to, I have no friends to do it with…

data.text:
Is that you, Cheval-chan?! What a coincidence! I 
came to do some fishing with the upper classmen!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Is that you, Cheval-chan?! What a coincidence! I 
<story>came to do some fishing with the upper classmen!

data.text: She ended up dragging me into this too…
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: She ended up dragging me into this too…

data.text: Aagh! Why can't I fish up anything?!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Aagh! Why can't I fish up anything?!

data.text:
Nngh… When I came with Sei-chan, 
we managed to catch a lot of fish. 
Why can't we catch any today…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Nngh… When I came with Sei-chan, 
<story>we managed to catch a lot of fish. 
<story>Why can't we catch any today…?

data.text: The way they move their rod is- No, someone like me shouldn't say something so rude to members of the Golden Generation of Uma Musume…
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: The way they move their rod is- No, someone like me shouldn't say something so rude to members of the Golden Generation of Uma Musume…

data.text:
I think I've got it! Teio-san, Spe-san, you 
shouldn't move your rods so much!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>I think I've got it! Teio-san, Spe-san, you 
<story>shouldn't move your rods so much!

data.text: Woah… Kita-san doesn't seem intimidated whatsoever by them… if only I was like her…
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: Woah… Kita-san doesn't seem intimidated whatsoever by them… if only I was like her…

data.text:
Cheval-chan! What else do you 
think they should be doing?
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Cheval-chan! What else do you 
<story>think they should be doing?

data.text: Huh? Wh-Why're you asking me?!
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>Huh? Wh-Why're you asking me?!

data.text:
Well you looked like a real pro when you casted 
your rod earlier!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Well you looked like a real pro when you casted 
<story>your rod earlier!

data.text:
I agree! Your movements looked so refined, like 
you've done this many times! I'd love to hear 
some tips from you.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I agree! Your movements looked so refined, like 
<story>you've done this many times! I'd love to hear 
<story>some tips from you.

data.text: N-No, I think you girls have the wrong—
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>N-No, I think you girls have the wrong—

data.text:
Woah♪ As soon as we did what you 
said, we started catching loads 
of fish! You're incredible!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Woah♪ As soon as we did what you 
<story>said, we started catching loads 
<story>of fish! You're incredible!

data.text:
What a great haul♪ Cheval, you're amazing! A 
true fishing genius!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>What a great haul♪ Cheval, you're amazing! A 
<story>true fishing genius!

data.text: Th-That's not true… not one bit…
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: <story>Th-That's not true… not one bit…

data.text:
Trust us, you're really amazing! Thanks for 
today! Let's go fishing together again sometime.
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Trust us, you're really amazing! Thanks for 
<story>today! Let's go fishing together again sometime.

data.text: Dia-chan, I'm home♪
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed: <story>Dia-chan, I'm home♪

data.text: Welcome home, Kita-chan♪
data.name: Satono Diamond
data.processed: <story>Welcome home, Kita-chan♪

data.text: Thanks to my friends, today was a lot of fun.
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed: <story>Thanks to my friends, today was a lot of fun.
